00096 UINT32      MainMenuScreenInit( )
00097 {
00098       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Version Label: %S", zVersionLabel ));
00099       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Version #:     %s", czVersionNumber ));
00100       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Tracking #:    %S", zTrackingNumber ));
00101 
00102       return( TRUE );
00103 }

00107 UINT32      MainMenuScreenHandle( )
00108 {
00109       UINT32 cnt;
00110       UINT32 uiTime;
00111 
00112       if( guiSplashStartTime + 4000 > GetJA2Clock() )
00113       {
00114             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00115             SetMusicMode( MUSIC_NONE );
00116             return MAINMENU_SCREEN;  //The splash screen hasn't been up long enough yet.
00117       }
00118       if( guiSplashFrameFade )
00119       { //Fade the splash screen.
00120             uiTime = GetJA2Clock();
00121             if( guiSplashFrameFade > 2 )
00122                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRectUsingLowPercentTable( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );        
00123             else if( guiSplashFrameFade > 1 )
00124                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, 0 );
00125             else
00126             {
00127                   uiTime = GetJA2Clock();
00128                   //while( GetJA2Clock() < uiTime + 375 );
00129                   SetMusicMode( MUSIC_MAIN_MENU );
00130             }
00131 
00132             //while( uiTime + 100 > GetJA2Clock() );
00133 
00134             guiSplashFrameFade--;
00135 
00136             InvalidateScreen();
00137             EndFrameBufferRender();
00138 
00139             SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00140             
00141             return MAINMENU_SCREEN;
00142       }
00143 
00144       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( CURSOR_NORMAL );
00145 
00146       if( gfMainMenuScreenEntry )
00147       {
00148             InitMainMenu( );
00149             gfMainMenuScreenEntry = FALSE;
00150             gfMainMenuScreenExit = FALSE;
00151             guiMainMenuExitScreen = MAINMENU_SCREEN;
00152             SetMusicMode( MUSIC_MAIN_MENU );
00153       }
00154 
00155 
00156       if ( fInitialRender )
00157       {
00158             ClearMainMenu();
00159             RenderMainMenu();
00160 
00161             fInitialRender = FALSE;
00162       }
00163 
00164       RestoreButtonBackGrounds();
00165 
00166       // Render buttons
00167       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_MENU_ITEMS; cnt++ )
00168       {
00169             MarkAButtonDirty( iMenuButtons[ cnt ] );
00170       }
00171 
00172       RenderButtons( );
00173 
00174       EndFrameBufferRender( );
00175 
00176       
00177 //    if ( gfDoHelpScreen )
00178 //          HandleHelpScreenInput();
00179 //    else
00180             HandleMainMenuInput();
00181 
00182       HandleMainMenuScreen();
00183 
00184       if( gfMainMenuScreenExit )
00185       {
00186             ExitMainMenu( );
00187             gfMainMenuScreenExit = FALSE;
00188             gfMainMenuScreenEntry = TRUE;
00189       }
00190 
00191       if( guiMainMenuExitScreen != MAINMENU_SCREEN )
00192             gfMainMenuScreenEntry = TRUE;
00193 
00194       return( guiMainMenuExitScreen );
00195 }

00206 void HandleMainMenuScreen()
00207 {
00208       if ( gbHandledMainMenu != 0 )
00209       {
00210             // Exit according to handled value!
00211             switch( gbHandledMainMenu )
00212             {
00213                   case QUIT:
00214                         gfMainMenuScreenExit = TRUE;
00215                         gfProgramIsRunning = FALSE;
00216                         break;
00217 
00218                   case NEW_GAME:
00219 
00220 //                            gfDoHelpScreen = 1;
00221 //                      gfMainMenuScreenExit = TRUE;
00222 //                      if( !gfDoHelpScreen )
00223 //                            SetMainMenuExitScreen( INIT_SCREEN );
00224                         break;
00225 
00226                   case LOAD_GAME:
00227                         // Select the game which is to be restored
00228                         guiPreviousOptionScreen = guiCurrentScreen;
00229                         guiMainMenuExitScreen = SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN;
00230                         gbHandledMainMenu = 0;
00231                         gfSaveGame = FALSE;
00232                         gfMainMenuScreenExit = TRUE;
00233 
00234                         break;
00235 
00236                   case PREFERENCES:
00237                         guiPreviousOptionScreen = guiCurrentScreen;
00238                         guiMainMenuExitScreen = OPTIONS_SCREEN;
00239                         gbHandledMainMenu = 0;
00240                         gfMainMenuScreenExit = TRUE;
00241                         break;
00242 
00243                   case CREDITS:
00244                         guiMainMenuExitScreen = CREDIT_SCREEN;
00245                         gbHandledMainMenu = 0;
00246                         gfMainMenuScreenExit = TRUE;
00247                         break;
00248             }
00249       }
00250 }

00254 BOOLEAN InitMainMenu( )
00255 {
00256   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00257 
00258 //    gfDoHelpScreen = 0;
00259 
00260       //Check to see whatr saved game files exist
00261       InitSaveGameArray();
00262 
00263       //Create the background mouse mask
00264       CreateDestroyBackGroundMouseMask( TRUE );
00265 
00266       CreateDestroyMainMenuButtons( TRUE );
00267 
00268       // load background graphic and add it
00269       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00270 
00271       if (iResolution == 0)
00272       {
00273       FilenameForBPP("LOADSCREENS\\MainMenuBackGround.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00274       }
00275       else if (iResolution == 1)
00276       {
00277             FilenameForBPP("LOADSCREENS\\MainMenuBackGround_800x600.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00278       }
00279       else if (iResolution == 2)
00280       {
00281             FilenameForBPP("LOADSCREENS\\MainMenuBackGround_1024x768.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00282       }
00283 
00284       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMainMenuBackGroundImage ));
00285 
00286       // load ja2 logo graphic and add it
00287       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00288 //    FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\Ja2_2.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00289       FilenameForBPP("LOADSCREENS\\Ja2Logo.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00290       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiJa2LogoImage ));
00291 
00292 /*
00293       // Gray out some buttons based on status of game!
00294       if( gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot < 0 || gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot >= NUM_SAVE_GAMES )
00295       {
00296             DisableButton( iMenuButtons[ LOAD_GAME ] );
00297       }
00298       //The ini file said we have a saved game, but there is no saved game
00299       else if( gbSaveGameArray[ gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot ] == FALSE )
00300             DisableButton( iMenuButtons[ LOAD_GAME ] );
00301 */
00302 
00303       //if there are no saved games, disable the button
00304       if( !IsThereAnySavedGameFiles() )
00305             DisableButton( iMenuButtons[ LOAD_GAME ] );
00306 
00307 
00308 //    DisableButton( iMenuButtons[ CREDITS ] );
00309 //    DisableButton( iMenuButtons[ TITLE ] );
00310 
00311       gbHandledMainMenu = 0;
00312       fInitialRender          = TRUE;
00313 
00314       SetPendingNewScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN);
00315       guiMainMenuExitScreen = MAINMENU_SCREEN;
00316 
00317       InitGameOptions();
00318 
00319       DequeueAllKeyBoardEvents();
00320 
00321       return( TRUE );
00322 }

00351 
00352 void MenuButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00353 {
00354       INT8  bID;
00355 
00356       bID = (UINT8)btn->UserData[0];
00357 
00358       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00359             return;
00360 
00361       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00362       {
00363             // handle menu
00364             gbHandledMainMenu = bID;
00365             RenderMainMenu();
00366 
00367             if( gbHandledMainMenu == NEW_GAME )
00368             {
00369                   SetMainMenuExitScreen( GAME_INIT_OPTIONS_SCREEN );
00370             }
00371             else if( gbHandledMainMenu == LOAD_GAME )
00372             {
00373                   if( gfKeyState[ ALT ] )
00374                         gfLoadGameUponEntry = TRUE;
00375             }
00376 
00377             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00378       }
00379       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00380       {
00381             RenderMainMenu();
00382             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00383       }
00384 }
00385 
00386 void MenuButtonMoveCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00387 {
00388       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00389       {
00390 //          btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00391             RenderMainMenu();
00392             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00393       }
00394       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE)
00395       {
00396 //          btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00397             RenderMainMenu();
00398             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00399       }
00400 }

00403 
00404 void HandleMainMenuInput()
00405 {
00406       InputAtom  InputEvent;
00407 
00408       // Check for esc 
00409       while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
00410   {
00411     if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP )
00412             {
00413                   switch( InputEvent.usParam )
00414                   {
00415 /*
00416                         case ESC:
00417                               gbHandledMainMenu = QUIT;
00418                               break;
00419 */
00420 
00421 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00422                         case 'q':
00423                               gbHandledMainMenu = NEW_GAME;
00424                               gfMainMenuScreenExit = TRUE;
00425                               SetMainMenuExitScreen( INIT_SCREEN );
00426 
00427 //                                  gfDoHelpScreen = 1;
00428                               break;
00429 
00430                         case 'i':
00431                               SetPendingNewScreen( INTRO_SCREEN );
00432                               gfMainMenuScreenExit = TRUE;
00433                               break;
00434 #endif
00435 
00436                         case 'c':
00437                               gbHandledMainMenu = LOAD_GAME;
00438 
00439                               if( gfKeyState[ ALT ] )
00440                                     gfLoadGameUponEntry = TRUE;
00441 
00442                               break;
00443 
00444                         case 'o':
00445                               gbHandledMainMenu = PREFERENCES;
00446                               break;                                    
00447 
00448                         case 's':
00449                               gbHandledMainMenu = CREDITS;
00450                               break;                                    
00451                   }
00452             }
00453       }
00454 }
00455 
00456 void HandleHelpScreenInput()
00457 {
00458       InputAtom                                                   InputEvent;
00459 
00460       // Check for key
00461       while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
00462       {
00463             switch( InputEvent.usEvent )
00464             {
00465                   case KEY_UP:
00466                         SetMainMenuExitScreen( INIT_SCREEN );
00467                   break;
00468             }
00469       }
00470 }

00473 void ClearMainMenu()
00474 {
00475       UINT32                                                             uiDestPitchBYTES;
00476       UINT8                                                              *pDestBuf;
00477 
00478       // CLEAR THE FRAME BUFFER
00479       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00480       memset(pDestBuf, 0, SCREEN_HEIGHT * uiDestPitchBYTES );
00481       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00482       InvalidateScreen( );
00483 }

00486 void SelectMainMenuBackGroundRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00487 {
00488       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00489       {
00490       }
00491       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00492       {
00493 //          if( gfDoHelpScreen )
00494 //          {
00495 //                SetMainMenuExitScreen( INIT_SCREEN );
00496 //                gfDoHelpScreen = FALSE;
00497 //          }
00498       }
00499       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00500       {
00501 /*
00502             if( gfDoHelpScreen )
00503             {
00504                   SetMainMenuExitScreen( INIT_SCREEN );
00505                   gfDoHelpScreen = FALSE;
00506             }
00507 */
00508       } 
00509 }

00511 void SetMainMenuExitScreen( UINT32 uiNewScreen )
00512 {
00513       guiMainMenuExitScreen = uiNewScreen;
00514 
00515       //REmove the background region
00516       CreateDestroyBackGroundMouseMask( FALSE );
00517 
00518       gfMainMenuScreenExit = TRUE;
00519 }
00520 
00521 
00522 void CreateDestroyBackGroundMouseMask( BOOLEAN fCreate )
00523 {
00524       static BOOLEAN fRegionCreated = FALSE;
00525 
00526       if( fCreate )
00527       {
00528             if( fRegionCreated )
00529                   return;
00530 
00531             // Make a mouse region
00532             MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gBackRegion), 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00533                                            CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectMainMenuBackGroundRegionCallBack ); 
00534             // Add region
00535             MSYS_AddRegion(&(gBackRegion) );
00536 
00537             fRegionCreated = TRUE;
00538       }
00539       else
00540       {
00541             if( !fRegionCreated )
00542                   return;
00543 
00544             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gBackRegion );
00545             fRegionCreated = FALSE;
00546       }
00547 }

00549 
00550 BOOLEAN CreateDestroyMainMenuButtons( BOOLEAN fCreate )
00551 {
00552       static BOOLEAN fButtonsCreated = FALSE;
00553       INT32 cnt;
00554       SGPFILENAME filename;
00555       INT16 sSlot;
00556       INT32 iStartLoc=0;
00557 #ifndef _DEBUG
00558       CHAR16      zText[512];
00559 #endif
00560 
00561 
00562       if( fCreate )
00563       {
00564             if( fButtonsCreated )
00565                   return( TRUE );
00566 
00567             //reset the variable that allows the user to ALT click on the continue save btn to load the save instantly
00568             gfLoadGameUponEntry = FALSE;
00569 
00570             // Load button images
00571       GetMLGFilename( filename, MLG_TITLETEXT );
00572 
00573             iMenuImages[ NEW_GAME ] = LoadButtonImage( filename, 0,0, 1, 2 ,-1 );
00574             sSlot = 0;
00575             iMenuImages[ LOAD_GAME ] = UseLoadedButtonImage( iMenuImages[ NEW_GAME ] ,6,3,4,5,-1 );
00576             iMenuImages[ PREFERENCES ] = UseLoadedButtonImage( iMenuImages[ NEW_GAME ] ,7,7,8,9,-1 );
00577             iMenuImages[ CREDITS ] = UseLoadedButtonImage( iMenuImages[ NEW_GAME ] ,13,10,11,12,-1 );
00578             iMenuImages[ QUIT ] = UseLoadedButtonImage( iMenuImages[ NEW_GAME ] ,14,14,15,16,-1 );
00579 
00580             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_MENU_ITEMS; cnt++ )
00581             {
00582                   switch( cnt )
00583                   {
00584                         case NEW_GAME:          gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt] = GetWidthOfButtonPic( (UINT16)iMenuImages[cnt], sSlot );    break;
00585                         case LOAD_GAME:         gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt] = GetWidthOfButtonPic( (UINT16)iMenuImages[cnt], 3 );              break;
00586                         case PREFERENCES: gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt] = GetWidthOfButtonPic( (UINT16)iMenuImages[cnt], 7 );              break;
00587                         case CREDITS:                 gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt] = GetWidthOfButtonPic( (UINT16)iMenuImages[cnt], 10 );             break;
00588                         case QUIT:                    gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt] = GetWidthOfButtonPic( (UINT16)iMenuImages[cnt], 15 );             break;
00589                   }
00590 #ifdef TESTFOREIGNFONTS
00591                   iMenuButtons[ cnt ] = QuickCreateButton( iMenuImages[ cnt ], (INT16)((SCREEN_WIDTH / 2) - gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt]/2), (INT16)( 0 + ( cnt * 18 ) ),
00592                                                                         BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00593                                                                         DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, MenuButtonCallback );
00594 #else
00595                   /*iMenuButtons[ cnt ] = QuickCreateButton( iMenuImages[ cnt ], (INT16)(420 - gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt]/2), (INT16)( MAINMENU_Y + ( cnt * MAINMENU_Y_SPACE ) ),
00596                                                                         BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00597                                                                         DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, MenuButtonCallback );*/
00598 
00599                   iMenuButtons[ cnt ] = QuickCreateButton( iMenuImages[ cnt ], (INT16)((SCREEN_WIDTH / 2) - gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt]/2), (INT16)( MAINMENU_Y + ( cnt * MAINMENU_Y_SPACE ) ),
00600                                                                         BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00601                                                                         DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, MenuButtonCallback );
00602 #endif
00603                   if ( iMenuButtons[ cnt ] == -1 )
00604                   {
00605                         return( FALSE );
00606                   }
00607                   ButtonList[ iMenuButtons[ cnt ] ]->UserData[0] = cnt;
00608 
00609                   #ifndef _DEBUG
00610                         //load up some info from the 'mainmenu.edt' file.  This makes sure the file is present.  The file is
00611                         // 'marked' with a code that identifies the testers
00612                         iStartLoc = MAINMENU_RECORD_SIZE * cnt;
00613                         if( !LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(MAINMENU_TEXT_FILE, zText, iStartLoc, MAINMENU_RECORD_SIZE ) )
00614                         {
00615                               //the file was not able to be loaded properly
00616                               SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00617 
00618                               if( pSoldier->bActive != TRUE )
00619                               {
00620                                     //something is very wrong
00621                                     pSoldier->bActive = pSoldier->bLife;
00622                               }
00623                         }
00624                   #endif
00625 
00626             }
00627 
00628 
00629             fButtonsCreated = TRUE;
00630       }
00631       else
00632       {
00633             if( !fButtonsCreated )
00634                   return( TRUE );
00635 
00636             // Delete images/buttons
00637             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_MENU_ITEMS; cnt++ )
00638             {
00639                   RemoveButton( iMenuButtons[ cnt ] );
00640                   UnloadButtonImage( iMenuImages[ cnt ] );
00641             }
00642             fButtonsCreated = FALSE;
00643       }
00644 
00645       return( TRUE );
00646 }

00648 
00649 void RenderMainMenu()
00650 {
00651   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00652 
00653       //Get and display the background image
00654       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiMainMenuBackGroundImage );
00655   BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00656   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00657 
00658       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiJa2LogoImage );
00659   BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, iScreenWidthOffset + 188, iScreenHeightOffset + 10, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00660   BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, iScreenWidthOffset + 188, iScreenHeightOffset + 10, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00661 
00662

00693       UINT8 cnt;
00694 
00695 //    RestoreExternBackgroundRect( (UINT16)(320 - gusMainMenuButtonWidths[TITLE]/2), MAINMENU_TITLE_Y, gusMainMenuButtonWidths[TITLE], 23 );
00696

00698       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_MENU_ITEMS; cnt++ )
00699       {
00700             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( (UINT16)((SCREEN_WIDTH / 2) - gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt]/2), (INT16)( MAINMENU_Y + ( cnt * MAINMENU_Y_SPACE )-1), (UINT16)(gusMainMenuButtonWidths[cnt]+1), 23 );
00701       }
00702 #endif
00703 }
